basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Staff Accountant
basics.summary: Experienced accountant with more than 15 years of accounting and financial analysis experience. Expertise in budgeting and economic analysis, financial reporting and resource optimization.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analyzed financial reports and programs to resolve problems. Monitored and researched significant revenue and budget variances, including actual costs versus budgeted costs. Advised senior management on finance-related issues. Recommended process improvements and prepared clear, concise presentations and reports.
highlights: Implemented a computerized capital budget review system in Lotus Notes email system.
Worked on a continuous Xerox copier project on a monthly basis for two years which successfully identified over 200 cost centers.
Worked closely with various departments such as design and construction, Biomed, and finance to close out work in progress accounts.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed financial functions and coordinated daily accounting functions. Formulated and implemented processes for reviewing recurring payments and processing invoices, vouchers, reimbursements and check requests.
